roleset.name: insane

role.descr: person or act that is crazy (often involves concatenation)

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to crazy-j. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: concatenation
example.text: They are mental to dive with barracudas!

example.name: mind's eye
example.text: What a mental image that creates!
